pr_title: [Issue-2566] Exit teku if eth1 service fails to start up

timeline.message: If Eth1DepositManager fails to start, throw fatal error and exit

timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: Used apache commons ExceptionUtils.getThrowableList() because the guava util throws if there's a loop.
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.bodyText: Just to confirm, this doesn't apply when the ETH1 node is down at startup right? We should keep retrying in that case until the node comes up.  Otherwise it gets very difficult to coordinate services properly in things like docker-compose.
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: Tested manually - we keep retrying if the eth1 node isn't up.  Also added some unit tests.
replies.author: mbaxter

timeline.message: Use utility to collect list of throwable causes
Add some tests to verify startup behavior
